The erdlu is a smaller version of the crodlu. Its body is covered in tough scales, and its folded forelimbs sprout useless wings. Hardy and fast, this drakelike creature is a fine riding beast for a Small rider. It is too skittish to be trained for war, however. Traits A Small character can use an erdlu as a mount. When an erdlu runs, it gains +4 to speed, instead of +2. The erdlu and its rider don't grant combat advantage when running. Standard Actions Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 123.
